pageProps.title: MindMeld - Conversational AI platform
pageProps.teaser: Conversational AI platform for deep-domain voice interfaces and chatbots

data.title: MindMeld - Conversational AI platform
data.slogan: Conversational AI platform for deep-domain voice interfaces and chatbots
data.description: The MindMeld Conversational AI platform is among the most advanced AI platforms for building production-quality conversational applications. It is a Python-based machine learning framework which encompasses all of the algorithms and utilities required for this purpose. (https://github.com/cisco/mindmeld)
data.author: Cisco
